section.heading: Privatization contracts, leases, provider agreements, and procedures requirements

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 19, 1994, D.C. Law 10-79, § 3, 40 DCR 8696
Temporary Repeal of Section For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 702 of Budget Support Temporary Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-78, January 26, 1996, law notification 43 DCR ).
